messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Laura Intro/Oklahoma
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Laura, I m in Oklahoma too!! Chrissie Laura  wrote: Hi All, I am Laura. I am a christian unschooler. I have been married 11 years as of
messages.messageBody:
Hey Laura,

I'm in Oklahoma too!!

Chrissie

Laura <momathome@...> wrote:
Hi All,

I am Laura. I am a christian unschooler. I have been married 11
years as of this last saturday! We live in Oklahoma City. I am
originally from Oklahoma, but just got home in December from a two
year move in the Houston, TX area. I have been unschooling since the
beginning, although I didn't realize it until about 4 years ago. I
have 3 kids. I have a boy 8, girl 5, and a baby girl 1. I am so glad
to be a part of this awesome group! I have learned a lot already
from lurking.

A friend of mine and I just started a new yahoo group tonight for
christian unschoolers in the OKC area. If any of you are here in
Oklahoma, please come and join us too on a local level! We are
wanting to get together with people that are in our area as well as
online! I look forward to being a part of this group!

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingchristiansinokcmetro

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Laura Intro/Oklahoma
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome Laura! Nice to meet ya and hope to get to know ya better..This is an awesome group from what I ve seen and the warm greeting everyone gives you
messages.messageBody:
Welcome Laura!
Nice to meet ya and hope to get to know ya better..This is an awesome group from what I've seen and the warm greeting everyone gives you here..Again, Welcome to the group!
Stacey

messages.subject: Laura Intro/Oklahoma
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All, I am Laura. I am a christian unschooler. I have been married 11 years as of this last saturday! We live in Oklahoma City. I am originally from
messages.messageBody:
Hi All,

I am Laura. I am a christian unschooler. I have been married 11
years as of this last saturday! We live in Oklahoma City. I am
originally from Oklahoma, but just got home in December from a two
year move in the Houston, TX area. I have been unschooling since the
beginning, although I didn't realize it until about 4 years ago. I
have 3 kids. I have a boy 8, girl 5, and a baby girl 1. I am so glad
to be a part of this awesome group! I have learned a lot already
from lurking.

A friend of mine and I just started a new yahoo group tonight for
christian unschoolers in the OKC area. If any of you are here in
Oklahoma, please come and join us too on a local level! We are
wanting to get together with people that are in our area as well as
online! I look forward to being a part of this group!

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingchristiansinokcmetro
